Retail (individual) investors, no. If you’re trading single contracts, you will not make millions — ever. Your profits only become substantial when you are trading bigger lots (dozens/hundreds/up) on a very well-vetted, disciplined strategy. Though you can nickel-and-dime your way to substantial losses with single-contract trades. The Really Big Wins you hear about are when an institutional investor places a huge bet on a black swan event — that is, a one-in-a-million occurrence — and guesses right. For the rest of us, that’s the express lane to poverty.
